* Deadline class represents a Task that has a deadline.
* @param deadline Date for the deadline of this item.
* Returns String representation of the Deadline item.
* @return A String that represents the Deadline item, including its description, done status
* Returns String representation of the Deadline object for data storage.
* The format is as such: D|{done status}|{description}|{deadline}
* Event class represents a simple Event with just a description, done status,

* @param fromDate The start date/time for this Event.
* @param toDate The end date/time for this Event.
public Event(String content, String fromDate, String toDate) {
